title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 363-11.6 - Emergency response plans
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 363-11.6 - Emergency response plans

State Regulations
(a) Emergency response plans must be prepared in accordance with subparagraph
360.16(c)(4)(iv) of this Title. (b) A site health and safety coordinator must be designated on a full-time basis
during excavation. The site health and safety coordinator must be trained in
hazardous waste operations and emergency response as referenced in
29 CFR section
1910.120, as incorporated by reference in
section
360.3
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
363-11.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
